name: Protector Casdin

topics.topic: AboutBrotherhood1Do you sell any specialty items?
topics.topic_text: How do you feel about the Brotherhood of Steel?
topics.response_text: Which one, the original Brotherhood out West, or the shit that Lyons turned it into out here?

topics.topic_text: What do you mean "the original Brotherhood?"
topics.response_text: I mean the Brotherhood from out West, back around California. We knew what we were doing back there. We didn't waste time with delusions of heroism.

topics.topic_text: How did Lyons change the Brotherhood?
topics.response_text: Oh, he used to be as tough as the rest of us. Wasn't so long ago, we fought side-by-side to Scourge the Pitt.

topics.topic_text: So what's your long-term plan for dealing with the Brotherhood?
topics.response_text: The Brotherhood came out here to recover technology from the eastern cities and bases. If Lyons won't do it, then we will.

topics.topic_text: That's enough.
topics.response_text: All right, then.

topics.topic_text: Tell me more about the Outcasts.
topics.response_text: We were cast out for our dedication to the Brotherhood's true goals. Lyons wanted to play hero to the locals, instead of doing his job.

topics.topic_text: I need to know more about the job before deciding.
topics.response_text: It's simple enough. Bring in technological devices, and we'll pay you for what you find.

topics.topic_text: I'll take the job.
topics.response_text: That's what I like to hear! You can start immediately.

topics.topic_text: I need time to consider it.
topics.response_text: Take all the time you need. But don't waste my time until you're ready to take the job.

topics.topic_text: I don't mean any trouble. I'm just passing through.
topics.response_text: Well, pass through some other direction. Or else you'll be "passing on."

topics.topic_text: I'm with the Brotherhood. I didn't expect to see troops so far out here.
topics.response_text: You haven't been with the Brotherhood for very long if you think we're your troops.{A little amused by the assumption}

topics.topic_text: You've got a laser. Technically, you'd be asking "with highly focused light."
topics.response_text: <grumble>{Long, low grumble, as if considering whether to shoot the player or to be impressed at his chutzpah.}

topics.topic_text: I think I made a wrong turn somewhere. I'll be leaving now, sir.
topics.response_text: You're damned right you will. Now, get.

topics.topic_text: I'll take .556 ammo.
topics.response_text: Here you go. Try not to use it all in one place, unless you have to.

topics.topic_text: I'll take frag grenades.
topics.response_text: Be careful. These can pack quite a pop.

topics.topic_text: I'll take Rad-Away.
topics.response_text: Useful stuff out there. Hope you don't have to use too much.

topics.topic_text: I'll take Stimpaks.
topics.response_text: Here. Everyone's favorite. What would we do without them?

topics.topic_text: I've got some technology to turn in.
topics.response_text: I see you've got some of our Power Armor there. I'll just take that off your hands.{Angry at the player.}

topics.topic_text: You'll like this. It's an Alien Blaster. Seriously.
topics.response_text: What in the world?{Trailing off, totally surprised}

topics.topic_text: Here, I found an Alien Power Cell.
topics.response_text: Interesting. Very interesting.{Trailing off, totally surprised}

topics.topic_text: Here's some Power Armor from the Enclave.
topics.response_text: Well I'll be damned. The Advanced Power Armor Mark II. This is superb. Absolutely superb.

topics.topic_text: Here's a Power Armor Helmet from the Enclave.
topics.response_text: This is some pretty heavy-duty stuff. We'll take good care of it.

topics.topic_text: What are you looking for, again?
topics.response_text: Power armor, energy weapons, and all sorts of advanced technology. Even some junk like sensor units or spare parts can be useful.

topics.topic_text: How about a Laser Pistol?
topics.response_text: We can always use another one of these.

topics.topic_text: How about a Laser Rifle?
topics.response_text: We can always use another one of these.

topics.topic_text: I've got a Plasma Pistol for you.
topics.response_text: Pretty rare piece of equipment, this. Good find.

topics.topic_text: I've got a Plasma Rifle for you.
topics.response_text: Pretty rare piece of equipment, this. Good find.

topics.topic_text: Take this suit of Power Armor.
topics.response_text: Always good to have another of these in the vaults.

topics.topic_text: Take this Power Armor Helmet.
topics.response_text: Not much good on its own, but the optics are useful, at least.

topics.topic_text: I've got a sensor unit for you.
topics.response_text: It's practically junk, but we can get some use out of it.

topics.topic_text: I've got some spare parts for you.
topics.response_text: It's practically junk, but we can get some use out of it.

topics.topic_text: This Tesla Armor might be of interest to you.
topics.response_text: You'd better believe it. I haven't seen a suit like this in a long time.

topics.topic_text: That's all for now.
topics.response_text: Okay, then.

topics.topic_text: So, are we good? You trust me enough now?
topics.response_text: You've definitely proven your worth. I'll make sure to tell our people on patrol that you're a friend of the Outcasts.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: I'm Protector Henry Casdin, leader of the Outcasts. This had better be good.

conversation.response_text: Keep that tech coming, and we'll make it worth your while.

description:
Protector Casdin is a 48 year-old Asian Male.

A disciplined and stern leader, Protector Casdin stands guard at the entrance to Fort Independence, the headquarters of the Brotherhood Outcasts. He wears the distinctive power armor of the Brotherhood, though modified with Outcast insignia. His Asian features are weathered by years of combat and exposure to the harsh wasteland environment.

Protector Casdin's Personality: Level-headed, professional, and uncompromising in his beliefs. Casdin is a traditionalist who strictly adheres to the original mission of the Brotherhood of Steel - collecting and preserving pre-war technology. He views Elder Owyn Lyons as a traitor for diverting resources to helping wastelanders instead of focusing on technological preservation. Despite his stern exterior, Casdin is deeply committed to his followers and takes his role as their leader seriously.

Protector Casdin's Backstory: Casdin was once one of the most accomplished soldiers in the Brotherhood of Steel and accompanied Elder Owyn Lyons during the expedition to the Capital Wasteland. He fought alongside Lyons during the 'Scourge of the Pitt,' demonstrating his combat prowess and loyalty to the Brotherhood's original mission. When Lyons shifted focus from technological preservation to helping wastelanders, Casdin grew increasingly disillusioned. After a conflict of ideologies escalated, Casdin led a group of like-minded members who seceded from the main Brotherhood. They seized Fort Independence, pushing back raider groups and establishing it as their headquarters. The renegades were termed 'Outcasts' by their former brothers, but they embraced this name as a badge of honor. Casdin has since led the Outcasts with a steady hand, attempting to reestablish communication with the western Brotherhood while maintaining their independence and focus on their original mission.
